pr_title: Azure Communication Service - Phone Number Administration SDK

timeline.message: Add Phone Number functionality to azure-communication-administration

timeline.bodyText: nit: suffix them with "_PROPERTYNAME"? It doesn't read well.
timeline.author: JianpingChen

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't these get picked from some configuration rather than being hardcoded?
timeline.author: ankitarorabit

replies.bodyText: This code is generated by AutoRest.
replies.author: waynemo

timeline.bodyText: Please ensure that none of these methods throw exception. Exception should be returned through Mono.error or Flux.error.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Perhaps we can update the error handling in a separate PR.
replies.author: waynemo

timeline.bodyText: In general, our javadocs should also include codesnippets on how to instantiate the client at the class level and how to use the APIs for each of the public methods.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Let's add this in a separate PR.
replies.author: waynemo

timeline.bodyText:
Add null checks before using user-input (phoneNumberCapabilitiesUpdate) and provide helpful error message. Do the same for other methods too.
Objects.requireNonNull(phoneNumberCapabilitiesUpdate, "'phoneNumberCapabilitiesUpdate' cannot be null");
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Perhaps we can update the error handling in a separate PR.
replies.author: waynemo

timeline.bodyText: Looks like all APIs in this class only uses phoneNumberAdminClient.getAdministrations(). So, it might be simpler to have the Administrations type as instance variable.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: This can be null in scenarios where the user initially set the pipeline but then decided to clear it out. These validations can be postponed until the build method is called.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: To be addressed in separate PR.
replies.author: waynemo

timeline.bodyText: Null check here is valid since we don't support adding null policies.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Remove Playback from classname as it can be run in playback, record and live modes.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: "PhoneNumberAsyncClientTest" is more of a unit test naming convention. Perhaps "PhoneNumberAsyncClientIntegrationTest"?
replies.author: waynemo

timeline.bodyText: Do not block when testing async clients. Use StepVerifier instead.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Will take a look at StepVerifier.
replies.author: waynemo

replies.bodyText: Updated async client tests to use StepVerifier.
replies.author: waynemo

timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: It's needed for mocking in the unit tests. If the tests are run in parallel, the mocks will have conflicts.
replies.author: waynemo

timeline.message: Updated class naming for integration tests
Simplify calls to autorest generated client
Update async client tests to use StepVerifier
